quote: In many cases, the more you try to compete, the less competitive you actually are.
author: Kathy Sierra

quote: Median is safe when you could use mean. Median is also safe when you shouldn't use mean. Median is useful when the distribution is normal and also useful when the data is not normally distributed.
author: Maggie Giust

quote: If you get, give. If you learn, teach
author: Maya Angelou
